formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Funktion in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'CALLERPRES' =-
[Syntax] CALLERPRES()
[Synopsis] Gets or sets Caller*ID presentation on the channel.
[Description] Gets or sets Caller*ID presentation on the channel. The following values are valid: allowed_not_screened : Presentation Allowed, Not Screened allowed_passed_screen : Presentation Allowed, Passed Screen allowed_failed_screen : Presentation Allowed, Failed Screen allowed : Presentation Allowed, Network Number prohib_not_screened : Presentation Prohibited, Not Screened prohib_passed_screen : Presentation Prohibited, Passed Screen prohib_failed_screen : Presentation Prohibited, Failed Screen prohib : Presentation Prohibited, Network Number unavailable : Number Unavailable

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:
